Class MiniBatchRegime

java.lang.Object
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.DelegatedRegime
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.MiniBatchRegime
All Implemented Interfaces:
HyperparameterConfigurable, Regime, BatchSizeConfigurable
@Strategy(CONCRETE) public final class MiniBatchRegime extends DelegatedRegime implements BatchSizeConfigurable
A training regime that performs mini-batch training.

In mini-batch training, the dataset is split into contiguous batches of a fixed size, and each batch is trained sequentially using the delegated BatchRegime.

Behavior

  • The batch size is configurable via BatchSizeConfigurable.
  • The dataset is partitioned into consecutive mini-batches of that size.
  • Each mini-batch is trained independently by delegating to BatchRegime.
  • No shuffling is performed; batches are taken in dataset order.

Use cases

Mini-batch regimes combine the computational efficiency of batch training with the convergence stability of stochastic updates, making them the most commonly used training regime in practice.

See Also:
